Scripts.OnLoad:
self.Title = "Target Frame" self:Hide()
-- create trait buttons self.traits = {} for i = 1,5 do self.traits[i] = CreateFrame( "DiceMasterTraitButton", nil, self ) self.traits[i]:SetSize( 24, 24 ) self.traits[i]:SetPoint( "BOTTOM", -56 + 28*(i-1), 52 ) self.traits[i].traitIndex = i self.traits[i]:SetScript( "OnMouseDown", function( self, button ) DiceMaster4.Inspect_OnTraitClicked( self, button ) end) end tinsert(DiceMaster4.EditModeFrames, self);

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end local healthMax = select(2, self:GetMinMaxValues()); local rate = 0.3; if ( healthMax > 50 ) then rate = 10/ healthMax end self.timer = C_Timer.NewTicker( rate, function() if self:IsMouseOver() and ( IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") or IsMouseButtonDown("RightButton") ) then DiceMaster4.Inspect_OnHealthClicked( button ) end end) DiceMaster4.Inspect_OnHealthClicked( button )

Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide(); if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end local manaMax = select(2, self:GetMinMaxValues()); local rate = 0.3; if ( manaMax > 50 ) then rate = 10/ manaMax end self.timer = C_Timer.NewTicker( rate, function() if self:IsMouseOver() and ( IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") or IsMouseButtonDown("RightButton") ) then DiceMaster4.Inspect_OnManaClicked( button ) end end) DiceMaster4.Inspect_OnManaClicked( button )
